mapper.select: SELECT b.id Id, b.user_id userId, b.tag, b.date, u.name writer, b.title, b.content, b.view_count viewCount, b.post_image postImage FROM board b JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE b.id = #{id}

SELECT b.id Id, b.user_id userId, b.tag, b.date, u.name writer, b.title, b.content, b.view_count viewCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment c WHERE c.board_id = b.id AND c.is_delete = 0) as commentCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hit h WHERE h.board_id = b.id) as hitCount FROM board b JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.id
REPLACE(b.title, ' ', '') LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{word}, ' ', ''), '%')
REPLACE(u.name, ' ', '') LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{word}, ' ', ''), '%')
REPLACE(b.content, ' ', '') LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{word}, ' ', ''), '%')
(REPLACE(b.title, ' ', '') LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{word}, ' ', ''), '%') OR REPLACE(u.name, ' ', '') LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{word}, ' ', ''), '%') OR REPLACE(b.content, ' ', '') LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{word}, ' ', ''), '%'))
ORDER BY b.date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT content FROM search_history WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%') LIMIT 7
